item.title: Heart Screening Pop-Up
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
Prior to Covid-19, Simon’s Heart and volunteer medical professionals from around the city visited schools to conduct heart screenings. Today, that is not possible. Some of our friends have donated their office space so that we can continue protecting hearts and saving lives. Join us in Wynnewood on September 17. Space is VERY limited and […]

The post Heart Screening Pop-Up appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Prior to Covid-19, Simon’s Heart and volunteer medical professionals from around the city visited schools to conduct heart screenings. Today, that is not possible. Some of our friends have donated their office space so that we can continue protecting hearts and saving lives.

Join us in Wynnewood on September 17. Space is VERY limited and COVID protocols will be followed. This will be offered on the third Thursday of every month.

REGISTER

The post Heart Screening Pop-Up appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Protect this Heart Screening (Sewell, NJ)
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
Inspired by the life of Nadiir King who passed away in 2014 from hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, Simon’s Heart is teaming up with Jefferson Washington Township Hospital, Washington Township HS, and the Sharp family to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The screening will take place at Washington Township HS on October […]

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Sewell, NJ) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Inspired by the life of Nadiir King who passed away in 2014 from hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, Simon’s Heart is teaming up with Jefferson Washington Township Hospital, Washington Township HS, and the Sharp family to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19.

The screening will take place at Washington Township HS on October 13th. There is no cost for the screening. It has been underwritten by donations from other parents.

The screening is intended for students who have never received an ECG exam or been examined by a cardiologist. The screening will look for undetected heart conditions that can lead to sudden cardiac arrest and death in the young, but is not a substitute for annual pediatric wellness visits.

To register, you will need to complete consent, medical and family history forms.

REGISTER
Download Flyer

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Sewell, NJ) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Protect this Heart Screening (Cherry Hill)
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
Simon’s Fund is teaming up with the Cherry Hill School District to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The screening will take place on April 21 at Cherry Hill East High School in the Library Annex located at 1750 Kresson Road in Cherry Hill. There is no cost for the […]

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Cherry Hill) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Simon’s Fund is teaming up with the Cherry Hill School District to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The screening will take place on April 21 at Cherry Hill East High School in the Library Annex located at 1750 Kresson Road in Cherry Hill. There is no cost for the screening. It has been underwritten by donations to Simon’s Heart. A special thanks to the Heart House and Premier Pediatric Cardiology for donating their services.

The screening is intended for students who have never received an ECG exam or been examined by a cardiologist. The screening will look for undetected heart conditions that can lead to sudden cardiac arrest and death in the young, but is not a substitute for annual pediatric wellness visits.

To register, you will need to complete consent, medical and family history forms. You can register by following this link.

Download the flyer – Cherry Hill Screening Handout

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Cherry Hill) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.content:encoded:
Simon’s Fund is teaming up with Friends Central to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The free screening will take place on April 8 at Friends Central School located at 1101 City Avenue in Wynnewood. There is no cost for the screening. It has been underwritten by donations to Simon’s Heart.

The screening is intended for students who have never received an ECG exam or been examined by a cardiologist. The screening will look for undetected heart conditions that can lead to sudden cardiac arrest and death in the young, but is not a substitute for annual pediatric wellness visits.

To register, you will need to complete consent, medical and family history forms. You can register by following this link.

Download the flyer – Friends Central Heart Screening

item.title: Protect this Heart Screening (Souderton)
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
Simon’s Fund is teaming up Billy Piotrowicz, an Eagle Scout,  to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The free screening will take place on September 16 at Souderton High School at 625 Lower Rd, Souderton, PA. The screening is being funded by donations received at previous heart screenings. The screening is intended for students who […]

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Souderton) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Simon’s Fund is teaming up Billy Piotrowicz, an Eagle Scout,  to offer free heart screenings for any student aged 12 – 19. The free screening will take place on September 16 at Souderton High School at 625 Lower Rd, Souderton, PA. The screening is being funded by donations received at previous heart screenings.

The screening is intended for students who have never received an ECG exam or been examined by a cardiologist. The screening will look for undetected heart conditions that can lead to sudden cardiac arrest and death in the young, but is not a substitute for annual pediatric wellness visits.

Registration will open in early August.

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Souderton) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Protect this Heart Screening (Tenafly)
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
We are excited to bring our screening to the families in Tenafly, New Jersey. Students between the ages of 8 – 19 are eligible. The screening will take place at the Stillman School gymnasium. Register here.

The post Protect this Heart Screening (Tenafly) appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
